name: <logger::Logger as log::Log>::flush

spin::once::Once::<T, R>::get.doc: Returns a reference to the inner value if the [`Once`] has been initialized.

log::Log::flush.doc:
Flushes any buffered records.

 # For implementors

 This method isn't called automatically by the `log!` macros.
 It can be called manually on shut-down to ensure any in-flight records are flushed.
